data.author: Anmol Sharma
data.content: Sri Lanka all-rounder Dhananjaya de Silva smashed wickets with his bat while trying to save ball from hitting stumps and got hit wicket out against West Indies during first Test on Monday. Dhananjaya defended a Shannon Gabriel delivery and as the ball trickled back, he tried to stop it from hitting stumps. In the process, he smashed his leg stump.
data.title: SL's Dhananjaya smashes wickets with bat while trying to save ball from hitting stumps

data.author: Pragya Swastik
data.content: Chennai Super Kings' official Twitter handle on Monday shared a picture showing MS Dhoni watching Shahrukh Khan's last-ball six as Tamil Nadu beat Karnataka to win Syed Mushtaq Ali Trophy (SMAT). Several fans reacted to the picture, with one tweeting, "SRK to CSK", while another saying, "IPL auction preparation." A tweet also read, "Finisher watching finisher finishing in style."
data.title: CSK shares pic of Dhoni watching Shahrukh's last-ball six in SMAT; fans react

data.author: Anmol Sharma
data.content: FIFA has revealed the candidates shortlisted for The Best FIFA Men's Player 2021 award, the winners of which will be revealed at an online ceremony on January 17, 2022. The nominees include Karim Benzema, Kevin De Bruyne, Cristiano Ronaldo, Erling Haaland, Jorginho, N'Golo Kante, Robert Lewandowski, Kylian Mbappe, Lionel Messi, Neymar and Mohamed Salah.
data.title: Nominees for The Best FIFA Men's Player 2021 award announced

data.author: Anmol Sharma
data.content: Team India players are not allowed to eat pork and beef in any form as per their new dietary plan, reports said. The reports further said that Team India players will only be allowed to eat meat in halal form. The decision has been taken in order to keep the players fit and healthy, reports stated.
data.title: Team India players banned from eating pork, beef; only halal meat allowed: Reports
